citations.narrative:
Item Primary Enclosures 3.6 a 1
At the time of inspection one cage was noted to have a broken missing bracket on the cage door which prevents the
cage door from closing securely.
The facility needs to repair/replace the cage door bracket so that it can be closed properly and be maintained in
good repair.
Correct by 5/21/14
An exit interview took place at the end of inspection

narrative:

PRIMARY ENCLOSURES.
Item Primary Enclosures 3.6 a 1
At the time of inspection one cage was noted to have a broken missing bracket on the cage door which prevents the
cage door from closing securely.
The facility needs to repair/replace the cage door bracket so that it can be closed properly and be maintained in
good repair.
                                                                                                                         Correct by 5/21/14
An exit interview took place at the end of inspection
